channel.title: Graphs on Bre's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Graphs on Bre's blog

item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Homerun Distribution by Team in 1980 query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity',color="blue",fill="white")+ coord_flip()+ ylab("homeruns")+ xlab("teams")+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Distribution")

item.title: Histograms
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Distribution of the weight of baseball players query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="white",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body-weight Distribution for Baseball Players")

item.title: Time Series
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Babe Ruthâ€™s homeruns during his career query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homeruns Totals Throughout the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")

item.title: Scatter Plots
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS career_hr,sum(SO) AS career_so FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=career_so,y=career_hr),size=3,color="blue")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts VS Homeruns for Great Hitters")+ xlab("career strikeouts")+ ylab("career homeruns")
